name: The Most Diabolical Scheme
author: Carlos Ruiz

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: Can I play The Most Diabolical Scheme if I do not control a villain character?

A:Yes, you can. However the first part of The Most Diabolical Schemeâ€™s ability is required to use the second part of the ability. So if you play The Most Diabolical Scheme without a villain character in play then you will not be able to banish an opposing character

flavor_text: Now comes the real tour de force Tricky and wicked, of course
rules_text: (A character with cost 3 or more can to sing this song for free.) Banish chosen Villain of yours to banish chosen character.
